1131,141|1112,146|1003,146|617,162|367,145|340,145|192,157|112,170|112,230|129,232|132,230|232,230|243,241|250,242|250,248|252,250|412,250|432,230|452,249|492,249|512,229|532,249|552,249|572,229|592,249|612,229|632,249|672,249|692,229|772,229|792,228|1092,228|1112,227|1432,227|1452,226|1772,226|1792,225|1898,225|1941,218|1936,167|1774,148|1585,147|1412,147|1392,146|1152,146|1133,141|1131,141 270-01|270|.|Letters|,|Orders|and|Instructions|.|October|1755|.
